snippet.title: KILL KNIGHT -  Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Warning: this trailer contains flashing lights.
KILL KNIGHT is an ultra-responsive arcade-inspired isometric action shooter. Condemned to eternal sufferance, deep within the voids of an eldritch arena, you must wield an arsenal of devastating weaponry to obliterate swarms of otherworldly horrors - and MASTER THE DEMON WITHIN.

Coming 2024.

To learn more about KILL KNIGHT, check out the game on Steam and wishlist now: https://bit.ly/KILLKNIGHTSteam

Make sure you join our official Discord to stay up to date - https://discord.gg/hVKUHRsCQs

Social Links:
X/Twitter - https://twitter.com/KillKnightGame
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@killknightgame
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/playsidestudios/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/PlaysideStudios/

Find out more about PlaySide Studios on its official website: https://www.playsidestudios.com/
